settings.title: What is Clean?
settings.text: In a world turned sideways, it’s a worthy question to ask. Is a surface clean if it’s “sparkling?”  Is a workplace safe if it seems “*clean and fresh?*” How long does a “disinfecting” wipe-down last? (Only till the next time it’s touched, right?) Answering these questions with complete honesty is at the heart of the PURTEQ® promise: At PURTEQ, we create non-toxic, sustainable products that deliver cleanliness with candor.

settings.title: FRESCH
settings.details:
• EPA-registered botanical disinfectant kills 99.9% of bacteria & viruses
  • Triple action: cleans, disinfects, deodorizes
  • Plant-based active ingredients
  • No harsh chemicals or fumes
  • Bleach & ammonia free
  • Suitable for use in school districts, transit systems, hotels, restaurants, gyms, and more

settings.title: PREVNT
settings.details:
• Revolutionary active-barrier cleaner enhances the effectiveness of FRESCH by continually cleaning surfaces & the air of inanimate contaminants for up to 90 days
  • Titanium dioxide (TiO₂) nanotechnology is a naturally occurring oxide often used as a food additive
  • Transparent water-based formula is designed for a wide variety of surfaces

settings.title: NSPECT
settings.details:
• Validate the level of clean with a Luminometer
  • Device commonly used in healthcare & food service
  • Test, monitor, & prove cleanliness in ways not visible to the naked eye
  • No special training is required to use the device or interpret the results

settings.title: Our Promise is in Our Products
A non-toxic cleaning system
settings.text: A two-step application of first FRESCH, then PREVNT, can leave your environment clean and safe for enduring, provable periods of time – depending on levels of use – without subjecting people to unhealthy toxins and fumes. Then, NSPECT offers tangible proof of that promise.

settings.title:
We just spread the promise
to a new realm of clean.
settings.details:
CITRAPURTM
  • Easy-to-use, citrus-based disinfecting wipes for business or home
  • Powerful against pathogens, yet a completely non-toxic alternative to name-brand wipes containing harmful chemicals – which were never meant for heavy use and can lead to toxic build-ups
  • Simple one-step, no-rinse cleaning and disinfection. Use as directed.
  • Approved on LIST N for use against SARS-CoV-2, the cause of COVID-19

settings.title: Rob Kabel, CEO
settings.text: Clean is the new normal. Safe and non-toxic ways to achieve a higher level of clean are critical to the health of workers, guests, employees, students… everyone. Cleaning should never be harmful. This is why we do what we do.
